content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position 0,0 to 2,0)
Consists of two furnace setups:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) processing iron ore to plates
- Stone furnace at (2,0) processing iron ore to plates

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position 4,4 to 6,4) 
Consists of two furnace setups:
- Stone furnace at (4,4) processing copper ore to plates
- Stone furnace at (6,4) processing copper ore to plates

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5,24.5 to 4.5,24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5)
- Boiler at (-2.5,24.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,24.5)
- Two pipe networks:
  - Water pipes connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam pipes connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electric pole network connecting power to other structures

### Research Lab
- Lab conducting automation research
- Connected to power grid
- Currently processing automation science packs

# ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisite Errors
- Check research prerequisites before attempting to start new research
- Automation research must be completed before Electronics research can begin

### Inventory Management Errors
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into machines
- Ensure required materials are harvested before attempting to reload furnaces

### Building Placement Errors
- Invalid arithmetic operations when calculating building dimensions
- Need to properly access entity prototype attributes instead of using direct arithmetic

### Research Status Checking Errors
- Always verify research is in progress before attempting to get research progress
- Handle cases where no research is active

### Power System Management
- Monitor coal levels to prevent power system failures
- Maintain adequate fuel supply in boiler
